verbs.description: sonic hq to [V: remain] [ARG3: in bricktown] [ARGM-TMP: after 2 3 billion acquisition by arby parent firm oklahoma city - based sonic corp] will keep its headquarters in bricktown after agreeing tuesday to be bought by the parent company of arby in a 2 3 billion deal the drive - in chain will operate independently within the inspire brands inc portfolio of restaurants sonic spokeswoman christi woodworth said tuesday sonic founded in oklahoma operates more than 3 600 drive - ins across the u s the merger agreement between sonic and inspire brands inc offers 43 50 per share in cash for each sonic share a premium of about 19 percent to monday closing price for sonic the acquisition also includes the assumption of sonic net debt sonic stock rose to almost that amount tuesday closing at 43 46 inspire owns sonic bricktown sonic drive in 2 3 billion sonic corp arby sonic hq arbys okc inspire brands inc arby
